# extensionContext

**Instance Property**

The context your credential provider extension uses to provide information to the system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var extensionContext: ASCredentialProviderExtensionContext { get }
```

## Getting the extension context

- **ASCredentialProviderExtensionContext**: A mechanism that credential provider extensions use to communicate with the system.
